think_procedure: The description of the knob 'track_counts' does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob. It only mentions that it is on by default and that it enables the collection of statistics on database activity. Therefore, it does not seem to be a 'special' numerical knob that has special values such as -1 or 0 that break the natural order and perform a very different function compared to its regular operation.
